definition: (of a slave or servant) to be given one's freedom/(of a prostitute) to marry and leave one's trade

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
surname Cong
good/very/very much

sentences.english: He was repaid for his conscientious anxiety in the character of a spectator.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個旁觀者，他那從良心出發的焦慮得到了補償。

sentences.english: Magdalene is about work — not miracles, not fairy tales.
sentences.chinese: 抹大拉從良所意味着工作，沒有奇蹟，沒有童話故事。

sentences.english: The good life is built with good relationships.
sentences.chinese: 美好人生，從良好的人際關係開始。

sentences.english: Relapse is a part of life at Magdalene.
sentences.chinese: 故態復萌是抹大拉從良所生活的一部分。

sentences.english: He couldn't do such a thing in all conscience.
sentences.chinese: 從良心上來講，他不能做這樣的事。

sentences.english: I eat vegetables because my conscience revolts against killing animals.
sentences.chinese: 我喫蔬菜，因爲我從良心上對殺生感到厭惡。

definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to give one's heart to/to devote one's life to
to make an exhibition of oneself/to be a disgrace
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to belittle/to scorn/to take sth lightly
to throw a net
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
ungrateful/heartless/to fail to be loyal to one's love
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
clean-living and honest (idiom); to avoid immorality/to shun evil influence/to mind one's own business and keep out of trouble/to keep one's hands clean
to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved (idiom)
the hypocrisy of the world (idiom)
